page.title: 06Entertainment at "The Club"
page.content:
In Hill of Beath Main Street there is an Ex-Serviceman's Club.In our club people go to play bingo and they win money and prizes.Every Sunday night people come to watch the cabaret and the terrific band.Sometimes people who are engaged show their presents in the club.Most people have memberships which they pay once a year.Sometimes the committee organises discos for adults.There are 12 members on the committee.The contest for the gala queen was held there in June 1985.18 girls went in for it and it was judged by our local headmaster,his wife and the minister.
{
